Program_Title: Rep. Marlin Stutzman (R-IN) Supports the No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act on the House Floor.wmv

Headlines: Rep. Marlin Stutzman (R-IN) discusses the scientific proof backing the claim that human life begins at conception - facts are stubborn things. Rep. Stutzman supports the Sanctity of Human Life Act and has been a tireless pro-life advocate in Congress.
